Package: com.oracle.fmwk8s.env

[Groovy] Class Database

      • com.oracle.fmwk8s.env.Database

      • Database class handles the common database operations that are required in E2E execution of FMW in Docker/K8S environments

        • Properties Summary

            Properties 
            Type Name and description
            static def  dbName
            the name of the database service
            static def  dbPassword
            the password to connect to db
            static def  dbPodName
            the kubernetes pod name of database pod
            static def  dbPort
            the port on which database service is up

        • Methods Summary

            Methods

            static def cleanDatabase(def script)
            static def deployDatabase()
            Deploys a specific version of database container in a kubernetes cluster.

          • static def deployDatabase()

            Deploys a specific version of database container in a kubernetes cluster.

            Parameters:
            script - the workflow script of jenkins
            databaseVersion - the version of database that needs to be deployed
            dbNamespace - the kubernetes namespace in which database is to be deployed
